dialogue: Guess your hands have been too busy to pick up.
Oh, really? Well, I'm her husband.
Ray, can we just keep it --
Keep it what, Maddy? You tell me. You tell me, Maddy. You want me to keep it cordial?
Yeah, you too, boyfriend! Madison, you're pathetic!
Ray, can you just leave us alone?
Goddamn it, Madison. Don't walk away from me. DON'T YOU FUCKING
He said apologize, motherfucker. He's a professional, he'll do it. Show him.
Professional what? Professional asshole. Really moving up in the world, aren't you, Madison? See you again, professional.
